about_the_game:
Destroy. Salvage. Repair. Upgrade. PROFIT! YOU must lead your mercenary company to victory!

Negotiate and embark on extended campaigns where each mission presents new challenges and encounters. Utilize called shots in battle to strategically cripple enemy mechs just in the nick of time. But winning is not enough. Between missions, salvage, scrap, and patch your units to stay operational. Succeed and earn the profits you deserve. Fail, and leave with nothing.

With brief respites between contracts, recover and upgrade your units. Hundreds of mechs to discover. Customize and modify every mech loadout to optimize your builds. Dozens of weapons to boost and mod with specialized equipment and upgrades. Coupled with unique pilot skills and perks, the interactions are endless!

Will you lead your mercenary unit to fame and riches, or will you collapse into bankruptcy?

Key Features:


  • Complex Strategic Gameplay - Command your squad in battle and plan your tactics to dominate the battlefield.
  • Precision Strikes - Turn the tide and cripple enemies with called shots where YOU direct powerful attacks against your enemies.
  • Salvage and Scrap - Make key choices between missions to salvage spare parts and mechs, or use your salvage rights to keep your mechs operational.
  • Upgrade and Customize - Earn cash and parts to upgrade your mechs, enhancing their capabilities with powerful weapons and advanced technologies.
  • Dynamic Missions - Each mission offers different objectives and outcomes based on your strategic choices and actions.
  • Tactical Depth - Every decision matters, from the deployment of forces to the management of resources, adding tension and importance to every action.

Prepare for an epic journey of tactical command, political intrigue, and relentless warfare. Rise as the most formidable mercenary commander, or fall in the unending struggle for power. Do you have what it takes to be a MetalMerc?
